QuICT.lib.qasm.node package¶

Submodules¶

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.barrier module¶

Node for an OPENQASM barrier statement.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.barrier.Barrier(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM barrier statement.

children[0] is a primarylist node.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.binaryop module¶

Node for an OPENQASM binary operation expression.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.binaryop.BinaryOp(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM binary operation expression.

children[0] is the operation, as a binary operator node. children[1] is the left expression. children[2] is the right expression.

latex(prec=15, nested_scope=None)¶

Return the corresponding math mode latex string.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

real(nested_scope=None)¶

Return the correspond floating point number.

sym(nested_scope=None)¶

Return the correspond symbolic number.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.binaryoperator module¶

Node for an OPENQASM binary operator.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.binaryoperator.BinaryOperator(operation)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM binary operator.

This node has no children. The data is in the value field.

operation()¶

Return the operator as a function f(left, right).

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the QASM representation.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.cnot module¶

Node for an OPENQASM CNOT statement.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.cnot.Cnot(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM CNOT statement.

children[0], children[1] are id nodes if CX is inside a gate body, otherwise they are primary nodes.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.creg module¶

Node for an OPENQASM creg statement.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.creg.Creg(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM creg statement.

children[0] is an indexedid node.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

to_string(indent)¶

Print the node data, with indent.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.customunitary module¶

Node for an OPENQASM custom gate statement.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.customunitary.CustomUnitary(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM custom gate statement.

children[0] is an id node. children[1] is an exp_list (if len==3) or primary_list. children[2], if present, is a primary_list.

Has properties: .id = id node .name = gate name string .arguments = None or exp_list node .bitlist = primary_list node

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.expressionlist module¶

Node for an OPENQASM expression list.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.expressionlist.ExpressionList(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM expression list.

children are expression nodes.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

size()¶

Return the number of expressions.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.external module¶

Node for an OPENQASM external function.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.external.External(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM external function.

children[0] is an id node with the name of the function. children[1] is an expression node.

latex(prec=15, nested_scope=None)¶

Return the corresponding math mode latex string.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

real(nested_scope=None)¶

Return the correspond floating point number.

sym(nested_scope=None)¶

Return the corresponding symbolic expression.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.format module¶

Node for an OPENQASM file identifier/version statement.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.format.Format(value)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM file identifier/version statement.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding format string.

version()¶

Return the version.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.gate module¶

Node for an OPENQASM gate definition.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.gate.Gate(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM gate definition.

children[0] is an id node. If len(children) is 3, children[1] is an idlist node, and children[2] is a gatebody node. Otherwise, children[1] is an expressionlist node, children[2] is an idlist node, and children[3] is a gatebody node.

n_args()¶

Return the number of parameter expressions.

n_bits()¶

Return the number of qubit arguments.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.gatebody module¶

Node for an OPENQASM custom gate body.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.gatebody.GateBody(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM custom gate body.

children is a list of gate operation nodes. These are one of barrier, custom_unitary, U, or CX.

calls()¶

Return a list of custom gate names in this gate body.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.id module¶

Node for an OPENQASM id.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.id.Id(id, line, file)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM id.

The node has no children but has fields name, line, and file. There is a flag is_bit that is set when XXXXX to help with scoping.

latex(prec=15, nested_scope=None)¶

Return the correspond math mode latex string.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

real(nested_scope=None)¶

Return the correspond floating point number.

sym(nested_scope=None)¶

Return the correspond symbolic number.

to_string(indent)¶

Print the node with indent.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.idlist module¶

Node for an OPENQASM idlist.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.idlist.IdList(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM idlist.

children is a list of id nodes.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

size()¶

Return the length of the list.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.if_ module¶

Node for an OPENQASM if statement.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.if_.If(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM if statement.

children[0] is an id node. children[1] is an integer node. children[2] is quantum operation node, including U, CX, custom_unitary, measure, reset, (and BUG: barrier, if).

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.indexedid module¶

Node for an OPENQASM indexed id.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.indexedid.IndexedId(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM indexed id.

children[0] is an id node. children[1] is an Int node.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

to_string(indent)¶

Print with indent.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.measure.Measure(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM measure statement.

children[0] is a primary node (id or indexedid) children[1] is a primary node (id or indexedid)

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node module¶

Base node object for the OPENQASM syntax tree.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node(type, children=None, root=None)¶

Bases: object

Base node object for the OPENQASM syntax tree.

add_child(node)¶

Add a child node.

is_expression()¶

Print with indent.

Exception for errors raised while interpreting nodes.

Bases: Exception

QuICT.lib.qasm.node.opaque module¶

Node for an OPENQASM opaque gate declaration.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.opaque.Opaque(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM opaque gate declaration.

children[0] is an id node. If len(children) is 3, children[1] is an expressionlist node, and children[2] is an idlist node. Otherwise, children[1] is an idlist node.

n_args()¶

Return the number of parameter expressions.

n_bits()¶

Return the number of qubit arguments.

qasm(prec=15)¶

Return the corresponding OPENQASM string.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.prefix.Prefix(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM prefix expression.

children[0] is a unary operator node. children[1] is an expression node.

class QuICT.lib.qasm.node.primarylist.PrimaryList(children)¶

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node

Node for an OPENQASM primarylist.

children is a list of primary nodes. Primary nodes are indexedid or id.

Bases: QuICT.lib.qasm.node.node.Node
